attributes.action: Create boot camps for young offenders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create boot camps for young offenders, run by ex. N.c.O,s, To be a secure unit, where yobs are made to work for their food and upkeep. their Human Rights are revoked, as they have broken the law. They must be taught to respect people and the country they were bought up in. hard labour is the answer to this thugs, I bet not many will reoffend.
